doing agile you live by something called a backlog it's a laundry list of any and everything that your product owner
believes that your software should do the goal of the product owners to make sure that your product backlog is in
priority order so they're moving items around all we're doing is assuming that

do it in because they're not going to ship it till you do them all they completely don't understand what agile
is about agile is about shipping as soon as there is value and that waterfall mindset is we don't ship it until all
